verses.text_plain: And Solomon determined to build an house for the name of the Lord, and an house for his kingdom.
verses.verse_html: 1And Solomon determined to build an house for the name of the Lord, and an house for his kingdom.

verses.text_plain: And Solomon told out threescore and ten thousand men to bear burdens, and fourscore thousand to hew in the mountain, and three thousand and six hundred to oversee them.
verses.verse_html: 2And Solomon told out threescore and ten thousand men to bear burdens, and fourscore thousand to hew in the mountain, and three thousand and six hundred to oversee them.

verses.text_plain: And Solomon sent to Huram the king of Tyre, saying, As thou didst deal with David my father, and didst send him cedars to build him an house to dwell therein, even so deal with me.
verses.verse_html:
3And Solomon sent to Huram the king of Tyre, saying, As thou didst deal with David my father, and didst send him cedars to build him an house to dwell therein, even so deal with me. ▼
▼ Huram: or, Hiram

verses.text_plain: Behold, I build an house to the name of the Lord my God, to dedicate it to him, and to burn before him sweet incense, and for the continual shewbread, and for the burnt offerings morning and evening, on the sabbaths, and on the new moons, and on the solemn feasts of the Lord our God. This is an ordinance for ever to Israel.
verses.verse_html:
4Behold, I build an house to the name of the Lord my God, to dedicate it to him, and to burn before him sweet incense, and for the continual shewbread, and for the burnt offerings morning and evening, on the sabbaths, and on the new moons, and on the solemn feasts of the Lord our God. This is an ordinance for ever to Israel. ▼
▼ sweet…: Heb. incense of spices

footnotes.body_html: ▼ sweet…: Heb. incense of spices

verses.text_plain: And the house which I build is great: for great is our God above all gods.
verses.verse_html: 5And the house which I build is great: for great is our God above all gods.

verses.text_plain: But who is able to build him an house, seeing the heaven and heaven of heavens cannot contain him? who am I then, that I should build him an house, save only to burn sacrifice before him?
verses.verse_html:
6But who is able to build him an house, seeing the heaven and heaven of heavens cannot contain him? who am I then, that I should build him an house, save only to burn sacrifice before him? ▼
▼ is able: Heb. hath retained, or, obtained strength

tokens.text: I then, that I should build

footnotes.body_text: ▼ is able: Heb. hath retained, or, obtained strength
footnotes.body_html: ▼ is able: Heb. hath retained, or, obtained strength

verses.text_plain: Send me now therefore a man cunning to work in gold, and in silver, and in brass, and in iron, and in purple, and crimson, and blue, and that can skill to grave with the cunning men that are with me in Judah and in Jerusalem, whom David my father did provide.
verses.verse_html:
7Send me now therefore a man cunning to work in gold, and in silver, and in brass, and in iron, and in purple, and crimson, and blue, and that can skill to grave with the cunning men that are with me in Judah and in Jerusalem, whom David my father did provide. ▼
▼ to grave: Heb. to grave gravings

footnotes.body_text: ▼ to grave: Heb. to grave gravings
footnotes.body_html: ▼ to grave: Heb. to grave gravings

verses.text_plain: Send me also cedar trees, fir trees, and algum trees, out of Lebanon: for I know that thy servants can skill to cut timber in Lebanon; and, behold, my servants shall be with thy servants,
verses.verse_html:
8Send me also cedar trees, fir trees, and algum trees, out of Lebanon: for I know that thy servants can skill to cut timber in Lebanon; and, behold, my servants shall be with thy servants, ▼
▼ algum: also called, almuggim

footnotes.body_html: ▼ algum: also called, almuggim

verses.text_plain: Even to prepare me timber in abundance: for the house which I am about to build shall be wonderful great.
verses.verse_html:
9Even to prepare me timber in abundance: for the house which I am about to build shall be wonderful great. ▼
▼ wonderful…: Heb. great and wonderful

tokens.text: which I am about to build

footnotes.body_html: ▼ wonderful…: Heb. great and wonderful

verses.text_plain: And, behold, I will give to thy servants, the hewers that cut timber, twenty thousand measures of beaten wheat, and twenty thousand measures of barley, and twenty thousand baths of wine, and twenty thousand baths of oil.
verses.verse_html: 10And, behold, I will give to thy servants, the hewers that cut timber, twenty thousand measures of beaten wheat, and twenty thousand measures of barley, and twenty thousand baths of wine, and twenty thousand baths of oil.

verses.text_plain: Then Huram the king of Tyre answered in writing, which he sent to Solomon, Because the Lord hath loved his people, he hath made thee king over them.
verses.verse_html: 11Then Huram the king of Tyre answered in writing, which he sent to Solomon, Because the Lord hath loved his people, he hath made thee king over them.

verses.text_plain: Huram said moreover, Blessed be the Lord God of Israel, that made heaven and earth, who hath given to David the king a wise son, endued with prudence and understanding, that might build an house for the Lord, and an house for his kingdom.
verses.verse_html:
12Huram said moreover, Blessed be the Lord God of Israel, that made heaven and earth, who hath given to David the king a wise son, endued with prudence and understanding, that might build an house for the Lord, and an house for his kingdom. ▼
▼ endued…: Heb. knowing prudence and understanding

footnotes.body_text: ▼ endued…: Heb. knowing prudence and understanding
footnotes.body_html: ▼ endued…: Heb. knowing prudence and understanding

verses.text_plain: And now I have sent a cunning man, endued with understanding, of Huram my father’s,
verses.verse_html: 13And now I have sent a cunning man, endued with understanding, of Huram my father’s,

verses.text_plain: The son of a woman of the daughters of Dan, and his father was a man of Tyre, skilful to work in gold, and in silver, in brass, in iron, in stone, and in timber, in purple, in blue, and in fine linen, and in crimson; also to grave any manner of graving, and to find out every device which shall be put to him, with thy cunning men, and with the cunning men of my lord David thy father.
verses.verse_html: 14The son of a woman of the daughters of Dan, and his father was a man of Tyre, skilful to work in gold, and in silver, in brass, in iron, in stone, and in timber, in purple, in blue, and in fine linen, and in crimson; also to grave any manner of graving, and to find out every device which shall be put to him, with thy cunning men, and with the cunning men of my lord David thy father.

tokens.text: to him, with thy cunning men

verses.text_plain: Now therefore the wheat, and the barley, the oil, and the wine, which my lord hath spoken of, let him send unto his servants:
verses.verse_html: 15Now therefore the wheat, and the barley, the oil, and the wine, which my lord hath spoken of, let him send unto his servants:

verses.text_plain: And we will cut wood out of Lebanon, as much as thou shalt need: and we will bring it to thee in floats by sea to Joppa; and thou shalt carry it up to Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html:
16And we will cut wood out of Lebanon, as much as thou shalt need: and we will bring it to thee in floats by sea to Joppa; and thou shalt carry it up to Jerusalem. ▼
▼ as much…: Heb. according to all thy need
 , ▼
▼ Joppa: Heb. Japho

tokens.text: as much as thou shalt need
and thou shalt carry it up

footnotes.body_text: ▼ as much…: Heb. according to all thy need
footnotes.body_html: ▼ as much…: Heb. according to all thy need

verses.text_plain: And Solomon numbered all the strangers that were in the land of Israel, after the numbering wherewith David his father had numbered them; and they were found an hundred and fifty thousand and three thousand and six hundred.
verses.verse_html:
17And Solomon numbered all the strangers that were in the land of Israel, after the numbering wherewith David his father had numbered them; and they were found an hundred and fifty thousand and three thousand and six hundred. ▼
▼ the strangers: Heb. the men the strangers

footnotes.body_text: ▼ the strangers: Heb. the men the strangers
footnotes.body_html: ▼ the strangers: Heb. the men the strangers

verses.text_plain: And he set threescore and ten thousand of them to be bearers of burdens, and fourscore thousand to be hewers in the mountain, and three thousand and six hundred overseers to set the people a work.
verses.verse_html: 18And he set threescore and ten thousand of them to be bearers of burdens, and fourscore thousand to be hewers in the mountain, and three thousand and six hundred overseers to set the people a work.
